survey_name: AI-Powered Mental Health App User Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on AI-powered mental health apps to improve functionality, user experience, and effectiveness.

questions.question_text: Which AI-powered mental health app do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture less common apps. Ensure the text box for 'Other' is optional.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which AI-powered mental health app do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How often do you use the app?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear frequency scale. Consider randomizing answer options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How often do you use the app?

questions.question_text: What features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with an optional text box.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the app's ability to understand and respond to your mental health needs?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced Likert scale. Consider displaying the scale horizontally for desktop users.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the app's ability to understand and respond to your mental health needs?

questions.question_text: Has using the app improved your mental well-being?
answer_options: No, it has made it worse
questions.client_notes: Include an option for negative impact to capture all experiences.

script.question_text: Has using the app improved your mental well-being?
answer_options: No, it has made it worse

questions.question_text: What do you like most about the app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Set a reasonable character limit.

script.question_text: What do you like most about the app?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather constructive feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the app?

questions.question_text: How important is privacy to you when using a mental health app?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure importance. Consider adding a tooltip explaining privacy measures.

script.question_text: How important is privacy to you when using a mental health app?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this app to others seeking mental health support?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) style question to gauge likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this app to others seeking mental health support?

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in the app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather ideas for future development.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in the app?
